{{Wired embedded system |brand=Synology |model=DiskStation DS214 |revision=+ |asin=B00GXZHBHG |newegg=N82E16822108169 |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |est_release_date=04/2014 |type=NAS |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=6 |pwr_conn=DIN |cpu1_brand=Marvell |cpu1_model=MV78230 |cpu1_cspeed=1.33 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Micron |fla1_model=N25Q064A |ram1=1 GiB |ram1_brand=SK Hynix |ram1_model=H5TC4G63AFR-PBA |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, USB 3.0, SATA II, eSATA |expansion_usb_num=3 |expansion_sata_num=3 |jtag=yes,, 20-pin header,, unpopulated,, J6 |serial=yes,, 6-pin header,, unpopulated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1),, J7 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Marvell |eth_chip2_model=88E1512 |eth_chip3_brand=Marvell |eth_chip3_model=88E1512 |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=2 |addl_chips=SATA Controller;Marvell;88SX7042;;1;,,, 2-Wire Real-Time Clock;ABLIC;S-35390A;;1;,,, <!--Seiko Instruments Inc. (2015) • ABLIC Inc. (2016) - Minebea Mitsumi/SII Semi Corp.--> USB 3.0 Host Controller;EtronTech;EJ168A;;1;,,, 8K 5V I2C Serial EEPROM;Microchip;24C08B;;1;,,, 8-Bit Flash Microcontroller;Microchip Technology;PIC16F883;;1;,,, Programmable High Density PLD;Lattice Semiconductor;LC4064V;;1;,,, 10A Int. FET Regulator w/ Programmable LDO;Semtech Corp;SC417;;1;,,, 30V, 9A P-Channel MOSFET;Advanced Power Electronics;AP4435GM;;2;,,, 30V, 14A N-Channel MOSFET;Fairchild Semiconductor;FDMS7694;;1;,,, 2A Bus Termination Regulator;Richtek;RT9199;;1; |flags=RTC w/ battery backup, eSATA, buzzer, fan |stock_boot=U-Boot;2011.12;SYNO-4484c15-2013-08-06; |stock_os=Linux;3.2.40; |default_ip=acquired via DHCP |oui_eth=00:11:32 }} {{TagLine|2-Bay Diskless Network Attached Storage (DS214+)}} :[https://www.synology.com/en-global/support/download/DS214+ Support page]
It's a 2-bay NAS. This device has 2x USB 3.0, 1x USB 2.0 and 1x eSATA ports. * "DDM24L2 V1.2" and "08-04DDM2412" are silkscreened on the board.
{{See also|List of NAS Devices|Synology DiskStation Devices}}
===Reviews=== *[https://www.storagereview.com/review/synology-diskstation-ds214-review ''Synology DiskStation DS214+ Review'' on '''StorageReview'''] (Apr. 2014)
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Marvell]] MV78230 @1.33GHz Dual Core (''Armada XP'' ARM V7) *Memory: 1GB (SDRAM) DDR3L *Storage: 8MB SPI NOR Flash, 2x SATA, 1x eSATA *Network: 2x Gigabit Ethernet port *Power: 12V, 6A via DIN
===See also=== :;[[Synology DiskStation Devices]] *[[Synology DiskStation DS212]] • [[Marvell]] 88F6282 (@1.6GHz) *[[Synology DiskStation DS212j]] • [[Marvell]] 88F6281 (@1.2GHz) *[[Synology DiskStation DS212+]] • [[Marvell]] 88FR131 (@2.0GHz) *[[Synology DiskStation DS213]] • [[Marvell]] 88FR131 (@2.0GHz) *[[Synology DiskStation DS213air]] • [[Marvell]] 88F6282 (@1.6GHz) *[[Synology DiskStation DS213j]] • [[Marvell]] ''ARMADA 370'' (@1.2GHz) *[[Synology DiskStation DS213+]] • [[Freescale]] P1022 (@1.0GHz) *[[Synology DiskStation DS214]] • [[Marvell]] ''ARMADA XP'' (@1.0GHz) *[[Synology DiskStation DS214se]] • [[Marvell]] ''ARMADA 370'' (@800MHz) *[[Synology DiskStation DS214+]] • [[Marvell]] MV78230 (@1.33GHz)
